QuestData.Title: Nowhere to Go
QuestData.Description:
We cannot stay here.
I do not know what to do... where to go next...
We will return to your Camp Nowhere. The tuskarr should know what happened at Rustpine.
If we tell our story and keep it, maybe it will not happen again...
QuestData.RewardText:
Our clan has been clawed to shreds.
I hope another will accept us.
